channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- InfoSphere Master Data Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- InfoSphere Master Data Management

item.title: CVE-2017-1309|2024-09-16T20:57:41.635Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20master%20data%20management
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Master Data Management Server 11.0 - 11.6 stores user credentials in plain in clear text which can be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 125463.

item.title: CVE-2020-4675|2024-09-16T17:28:53.595Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20master%20data%20management
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Master Data Management Server 11.6 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 186324.

item.title: CVE-2016-9715|2024-09-16T20:36:47.072Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20master%20data%20management
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Master Data Management Server 11.0, 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 11.6 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 119728.

item.title: CVE-2017-1199|2024-09-16T17:43:09.117Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20master%20data%20management
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Master Data Management Server 10.0, 11.0, 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 11.6 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 123674.

item.title: CVE-2016-9718|2024-09-16T18:38:33.858Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20master%20data%20management
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Master Data Management Server 10.1. 11.0. 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 11.6 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 119732.

item.title: CVE-2016-9719|2024-09-16T18:39:38.523Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20master%20data%20management
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Master Data Management Server 10.1. 11.0. 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 11.6 could allow a remote attacker to hijack the clicking action of the victim. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hijack the victim's click actions and possibly launch further attacks against the victim. IBM X-Force ID: 119733.

item.title: CVE-2016-9714|2024-09-16T19:46:40.495Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20master%20data%20management
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Master Data Management Server 10.1, 11.0, 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 11.6 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 119727.
